prompt: Create a professional drawer menu page with a light blue background and a navy blue app bar. The drawer should have a header with a circular avatar (user icon), user name 'Olivia Clark' in bold white, and email 'olivia.clark@example.com' in light gray. Below, add a divider, followed by menu items: Overview (overview icon), Profile (person icon), Settings (settings icon), Support (support agent icon), and Logout (exit icon). Use ListTiles with navy blue icons and text, and add a selected state highlight for the Overview item. The main content should display a centered welcome message in navy blue with a gray subtitle, and include a bottom navigation bar with Home and Profile icons. Use Material Design with 16px padding and consistent spacing.
